title: Samsung Partners with Coinbase for Direct Crypto Buys via Samsung Pay
description: Samsung has partnered with Coinbase to integrate Samsung Pay into the Coinbase app, enabling Galaxy users in the US and Canada to buy cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin and Ethereum directly via their smartphones, bypassing traditional banks. This move, launched July 29, 2025, aims to normalize crypto adoption and bridge fiat and digital currencies.

title: PayPal Expands Crypto Payments: 100+ Coins for U.S. Merchants with Fee Cuts
description: PayPal has expanded its "Pay with Crypto" feature, allowing U.S. merchants to accept over 100 cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin and XRP for payments, with near-instant settlements and up to 90% fee reductions on cross-border transactions. This strategic move aims to streamline global commerce while mitigating volatility risks through seamless fiat conversions.
